name: Deadly Inheritance
description:
--DO NOT PLAY WITH FULLSCREEN--

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2023.1 within 4 days, this is a small rogue - like where once you are killed you receive the weapon of your killer, meaning your end is the beginning of a new play style.

--CONTROLS--

WASD - Move around

SPACE - Dash

RIGHT CLICK - Shoot

ESC - Pause
